name: botframework-emulator-tests
description: Emulator for the Microsoft Bot Framework. Allows developers to test and debug their bots on localhost.

scripts.test:integration: cross-env TEST_ENV=1 ELECTRON_NO_ATTACH_CONSOLE=1 mocha -t 20000 --compilers ts:ts-node/register integration/*.ts || exit 0
scripts.test:performance: cross-env TEST_ENV=1 ELECTRON_NO_ATTACH_CONSOLE=1 mocha -t 20000 --compilers ts:ts-node/register performance/*.ts || exit 0
scripts.test:unit: cross-env TEST_ENV=1 ELECTRON_NO_ATTACH_CONSOLE=1 electron-mocha -t 10000 --renderer --compilers ts:ts-node/register unit/*.ts || exit 0
scripts.test: npm run test:unit && npm run test:integration

author: Microsoft Corp.
